title.rendered: Top Games to Play with Online Cricket ID

content.rendered:
With millions of followers and players around the world, cricket is now considered the most played and loved sport globally along with other sports including football, rugby, tennis, etc, especially in India. Whether played outdoors or indoors, this sport has been played with the great enthusiasm, fun, and entertainment. The hike in playing these sports was also seen during the pandemic as there was nothing to do for the people and cricket connected the people with the international community. 

Here comes the Online Cricket ID that adds some spice to this game. Creating an Online ID is now fun and requires simple steps to create this unique code. With this Cricket ID, you can play and bet on multiple live sports and matches, making your favorite game win the game by supporting them also, increasing your chances of winning.

There are multiple trusted online betting sites in India including Tiger Exchange (Tiger Exch), which offers hundreds of games with joining bonuses and has the most friendly user web interface allowing the fans and followers to bet on their favorite team in real-time. Whether you are an android or ios user, you can easily play and win with Tiger Exch.

On the other hand, playing with Tiger Exchange is exciting as you easily get access to betting tips and cricket tips which you can use to bet and win on your favorite match.

Some Top Fantasy Games to play with Online Cricket ID

World Cricket Championship 2 (WCC2)

The World Cricket Championship 2 game for Android users is without a question one of the best multiplayer cricket games. The best-rated cricket game for Android users is WCC2, which has accurate game physics and online and offline 1v1 and 1vN multiplayer modes. If you’re a devotee of MS Dhoni, you’ll adore playing the game’s helicopter shots. There are 42 stadiums to choose from, over 150 batting animations, 28 bowling actions, 18 foreign teams, and 10 domestic teams in the game. Cricket enthusiasts who want to play like Virat Kohli, MS Dhoni, and other legendary players will find this game to be a haven.

Cricket Clash

Looking to work on your batting technique in your preferred sport? All those who take hitting seriously will love the game Cricket Clash. For Android and iOS users, Cricket Clash is a 1v1 multiplayer cricket game where you can hone your abilities and perfect your shots. You earn runs by hitting fours and sixes during the game’s two overs. You get to score twice as many runs in the second over of the game. When you fight for runs with a real opponent, you go through a true cricket challenge. On the MPL app for Android and iOS users, there is a multiplayer cricket game accessible. You can compete in money competitions or practice against an opponent by playing the free activities.

Sachin Saga

You might be tempted to play this multiplayer cricket game just by hearing the word. Millions of people consider Sachin Tendulkar to be the uncontested God of Cricket. You have to play this game if you’re a Tendulkar devotee. You can play as this legendary cricketer and become the master shooter in the game. With Tendulkar’s renowned batting, bowling, and fielding techniques, Sachin Saga will offer you an authentic cricket experience.

You would also enjoy witnessing the iconic Sachin matches and situations that have been reenacted. The game has a story mode that will lead you on a voyage through Sachin’s formidable foes and worst nightmares and a multiplayer cricket game mode. This game is available for free from the Play Store.

Stick Cricket Live

For Android fans, there is a 3D cricket game called Stick Cricket Live. The online component of the game is its main focus. Each participant in the game has three overs to take on the bowlers of the opposition. The match is won by the player who gets the most runs. 

The game includes 3D cricket fields from all over the globe, including Dubai and Dharamshala. One of the top Android multiplayer cricket apps in 2021 is Stick Cricket Live.

CSK Battle of Chepauk 2

Battle of Chepauk 2 is undoubtedly one of the top multiplayer cricket games for MS Dhoni enthusiasts. Players can control their own CSK IPL squad in the game as Captain Dhoni. Create your squad, choose your players, and select one of the five available cricket game modes, such as super over, super chase, multiplayer, and slog.

The Battle of Chepauk 2 matches can be played for 2 to 5 overs in a multiplayer format with 2 to 5 players in either private mode (offline) or public mode (online). When playing with friends, the private option is recommended because it allows players to establish a room, and only those who have the room ID can join the game. Download this enjoyable game now.

Big Bash Cricket

One of the finest multiplayer cricket games that you can play with Online Cricket ID includes Big Bash Cricket that features easy-to-use controls and cutting-edge, highly customized, realistic game animations. The game has a multiplayer mode that accommodates up to five people and allows for both public (online) and private play. (offline). The Australian Big Bash League’s official sport, Big Bash Cricket, features three game types: a mini super over game, a quick play, and a complete BBL tournament.

Read More: 5 Reasons Why Having an Online Cricket ID is a Must for Every Cricket Fan
